data.name: Park Plaza Science Park
data.description: Boasting a strategic setting at the heart of Zhongguancun, this grand hotel offers the perfect destination for discerning business and leisure travellers. The hotel is surrounded by Beijing's top universities and research institutes, and is a mere 20 minutes' driving distance away from the heart of the mesmerising Tiananmen Square and Beijing Railway Station. Just a 2 minutes' walking distance away from the hotel, guests will find a bus stop which offers ease of access to other areas of this intriguing city. This contemporary hotel boasts a striking architectural style, welcoming guests with warm hospitality and modern design. The guest rooms are beautifully appointed, and feature exemplary amenities for visitors' convenience and comfort. Guests will find an abundance of high-quality facilities, catering to their leisure, dining and business need to the highest degree of excellence., Year of construction: 2001, Year of most recent renovation: 2011, Number of floors (main building): 18, Total number of rooms: 394, Category: 4 STARS, Hotel Chain: RADISSON HOTEL GROUP, City centre: 12500 m, Airport: 28800 m, Bus/Train station: 15100 m

policies.description:
If cancelled up to 6 Days of check in date, user needs to pay 100 Percentage cancellation charges.
Additional fee and taxes may apply.
If you would like to book a cot, please contact TravelCarma Team at support@travelcarma.com.

Alert : National Rating:For the benefit of our customers, we have provided a rating based on our rating system.Know Before You Go:   Only registered guests are allowedin the guestrooms.   Fees: The following fees and deposits are charged by the property at time of service, check-in, or check-out.   Fee for buffet breakfast: CNY 147 per person (approximately)     Airport shuttle fee: CNY 550 per vehicle (one way)     Nearby parking fee: CNY 6 per hour                    The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change.
Alert : 24-hour airport shuttle service is available on request. Fees may apply. Contact the property in advance to get details.
